summary: Most requested offline-first guest mode functionality appears implemented: unauthenticated users land on an OfflineDashboard, backend React Query hooks are guarded by identity, offline share packages (self-contained HTML) can be exported/imported, received files can be saved via File System Access API with download fallback, and a service worker + manifest enable offline app-shell caching with clear offline messaging for online-only features. However, the diff shows a modification to a file explicitly constrained as 'do not edit' (useInternetIdentity.ts).

hallucinated_features.description: Modified a file that the BuildRequest constraints explicitly forbade editing (useInternetIdentity.ts).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest included a constraint to not edit frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, but it appears under MODIFIED FILES in the diff.
